/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering structures. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades bathed in sunlight. Cars and trucks, parked and in motion, add a dynamic element to the scene. The street itself is lined with trees, their green foliage adding a touch of nature to the urban setting.
